name: Spooky Planets
description:
You see that big guy?
They wants to scare you, but they are a bit heavy, if you could lift them up it would be great.

Blob - https://lionheart963.itch.io/blob-minion

Slime - https://yvodlynpaul.itch.io/tiny-slim-character

Heavy - https://ansimuz.itch.io/living-tissue-environment

Music - https://davidkbd.itch.io/eternity-metal-scfi-music-pack

Destroyed Planet - https://helianthus-games.itch.io/animated-pixel-art-planets

Galaxy - https://ansimuz.itch.io/space-background

Deaths- https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-animated-monsters

A game made for shitty horror jam
